# Problem 10.6 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A T-beam has dimensions b<sub>1</sub> = 1 in., b<sub>2</sub> = 9 in., h<sub>1</sub> = 6 in., and h<sub>2</sub> = 1 in. If the shear force at this section is V = 5 kips, determine the shear stress at section a-a.
